text: Leslie Herbert Wexner (born September 8, 1937) is an American billionaire businessman. He is the founder and chairman emeritus of L Brands (formerly Limited Brands). He retired in February 2020. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American billionaires Category:American Jews Category:Philanthropists from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Dayton, Ohio Category:Jewish billionaires Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish philanthropists
title: Les Wexner
